data.textUthmani: وَنَـٰدَيْنَـٰهُ مِن جَانِبِ ٱلطُّورِ ٱلْأَيْمَنِ وَقَرَّبْنَـٰهُ نَجِيًّا
data.wordByWord: وَنَـٰدَيْنَـٰهُ [And We called him] مِن [from] جَانِبِ [(the) side] ٱلطُّورِ [(of) the Mount] ٱلْأَيْمَنِ [the right] وَقَرَّبْنَـٰهُ [and brought him near] نَجِيًّۭا [(for) conversation]
data.transliteration: Wanadaynahu min janibiattoori al-aymani waqarrabnahu najiyya

data.textUthmani: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُۥ مِن رَّحْمَتِنَآ أَخَاهُ هَـٰرُونَ نَبِيًّا
data.wordByWord: وَوَهَبْنَا [And We bestowed] لَهُۥ [[to] him] مِن [from] رَّحْمَتِنَآ [Our Mercy] أَخَاهُ [his brother] هَـٰرُونَ [Harun] نَبِيًّۭا [a Prophet]
data.transliteration: Wawahabna lahu min rahmatinaakhahu haroona nabiyya

data.textUthmani: وَٱذْكُرْ فِى ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ إِسْمَـٰعِيلَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صَادِقَ ٱلْوَعْدِ وَكَانَ رَسُولًا نَّبِيًّا
data.wordByWord: وَٱذْكُرْ [And mention] فِى [in] ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ [the Book] إِسْمَـٰعِيلَ ۚ [Ishmael] إِنَّهُۥ [Indeed, he] كَانَ [was] صَادِقَ [true] ٱلْوَعْدِ [(to his) promise] وَكَانَ [and was] رَسُولًۭا [a Messenger ] نَّبِيًّۭا [a Prophet]
data.transliteration: Wathkur fee alkitabiismaAAeela innahu kana sadiqa alwaAAdi wakanarasoolan nabiyya

data.textUthmani: وَكَانَ يَأْمُرُ أَهْلَهُۥ بِٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَٱلزَّكَوٰةِ وَكَانَ عِندَ رَبِّهِۦ مَرْضِيًّا
data.wordByWord: وَكَانَ [And he used] يَأْمُرُ [(to) enjoin] أَهْلَهُۥ [(on) his people] بِٱلصَّلَوٰةِ [the prayer] وَٱلزَّكَوٰةِ [and zakah] وَكَانَ [and was] عِندَ [near] رَبِّهِۦ [his Lord] مَرْضِيًّۭا [pleasing]
data.transliteration: Wakana ya/muru ahlahu bissalatiwazzakati wakana AAinda rabbihi mardiyya

data.textUthmani: وَٱذْكُرْ فِى ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ إِدْرِيسَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صِدِّيقًا نَّبِيًّا
data.wordByWord: وَٱذْكُرْ [And mention] فِى [in] ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ [the Book] إِدْرِيسَ ۚ [Idris] إِنَّهُۥ [Indeed, he] كَانَ [was] صِدِّيقًۭا [truthful] نَّبِيًّۭا [a Prophet]
data.transliteration: Wathkur fee alkitabiidreesa innahu kana siddeeqan nabiyya

data.wordByWord: وَرَفَعْنَـٰهُ [And We raised him] مَكَانًا [(to) a position] عَلِيًّا [high]

data.textUthmani: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنْعَمَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهِم مِّنَ ٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ مِن ذُرِّيَّةِ ءَادَمَ وَمِمَّنْ حَمَلْنَا مَعَ نُوحٍ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّةِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ وَمِمَّنْ هَدَيْنَا وَٱجْتَبَيْنَآ ۚ إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَايَـٰتُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ خَرُّوا۟ سُجَّدًا وَبُكِيًّا ۩
data.wordByWord: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ [Those] ٱلَّذِينَ [(were) the ones whom] أَنْعَمَ [Allah bestowed favor] ٱللَّهُ [Allah bestowed favor] عَلَيْهِم [upon them] مِّنَ [from (among)] ٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ [the Prophets] مِن [of] ذُرِّيَّةِ [(the) offspring] ءَادَمَ [(of) Adam] وَمِمَّنْ [and of those] حَمَلْنَا [We carried] مَعَ [with] نُوحٍۢ [Nuh] وَمِن [and of] ذُرِّيَّةِ [(the) offspring] إِبْرَٰهِيمَ [(of) Ibrahim] وَإِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ [and Israel] وَمِمَّنْ [and of (those) whom] هَدَيْنَا [We guided] وَٱجْتَبَيْنَآ ۚ [and We chose] إِذَا [When] تُتْلَىٰ [were recited] عَلَيْهِمْ [to them] ءَايَـٰتُ [(the) Verses] ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ [(of) the Most Gracious] خَرُّوا۟ [they fell] سُجَّدًۭا [prostrating] وَبُكِيًّۭا ۩ [and weeping]
data.transliteration: Ola-ika allatheena anAAama AllahuAAalayhim mina annabiyyeena min thurriyyati adamawamimman hamalna maAAa noohin wamin thurriyyatiibraheema wa-isra-eela wamimman hadayna wajtabaynaitha tutla AAalayhim ayatu arrahmanikharroo sujjadan wabukiyya

data.textUthmani: ۞ فَخَلَفَ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ خَلْفٌ أَضَاعُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ ٱلشَّهَوَٰتِ ۖ فَسَوْفَ يَلْقَوْنَ غَيًّا
data.wordByWord: ۞ فَخَلَفَ [Then succeeded] مِنۢ [after them] بَعْدِهِمْ [after them] خَلْفٌ [successors] أَضَاعُوا۟ [who neglected] ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ [the prayer] وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ [and they followed] ٱلشَّهَوَٰتِ ۖ [the lusts] فَسَوْفَ [so soon] يَلْقَوْنَ [they will meet] غَيًّا [evil]
data.transliteration: Fakhalafa min baAAdihim khalfun adaAAooassalata wattabaAAoo ashshahawatifasawfa yalqawna ghayya

data.textUthmani: إِلَّا مَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَـٰلِحًا فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ يَدْخُلُونَ ٱلْجَنَّةَ وَلَا يُظْلَمُونَ شَيْـًٔا
data.wordByWord: إِلَّا [Except] مَن [(one) who] تَابَ [repented] وَءَامَنَ [and believed] وَعَمِلَ [and did] صَـٰلِحًۭا [good (deeds)] فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ [Then those] يَدْخُلُونَ [will enter] ٱلْجَنَّةَ [Paradise] وَلَا [and not] يُظْلَمُونَ [they will be wronged] شَيْـًۭٔا [(in) anything]
data.transliteration: Illa man taba waamanawaAAamila salihan faola-ika yadkhuloonaaljannata wala yuthlamoona shay-a

data.textUthmani: جَنَّـٰتِ عَدْنٍ ٱلَّتِى وَعَدَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ عِبَادَهُۥ بِٱلْغَيْبِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ وَعْدُهُۥ مَأْتِيًّا
data.wordByWord: جَنَّـٰتِ [Gardens] عَدْنٍ [(of) Eden] ٱلَّتِى [which] وَعَدَ [promised] ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ [the Most Gracious] عِبَادَهُۥ [(to) His slaves] بِٱلْغَيْبِ ۚ [in the unseen] إِنَّهُۥ [Indeed, [it]] كَانَ [is] وَعْدُهُۥ [His promise] مَأْتِيًّۭا [sure to come]
data.transliteration: Jannati AAadnin allatee waAAada arrahmanuAAibadahu bighaybi innahu kana waAAduhuma/tiyya

data.textUthmani: لَّا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًا إِلَّا سَلَـٰمًا ۖ وَلَهُمْ رِزْقُهُمْ فِيهَا بُكْرَةً وَعَشِيًّا
data.wordByWord: لَّا [Not] يَسْمَعُونَ [they will hear] فِيهَا [therein] لَغْوًا [vain talk] إِلَّا [but] سَلَـٰمًۭا ۖ [peace] وَلَهُمْ [And for them] رِزْقُهُمْ [(is) their provision] فِيهَا [therein] بُكْرَةًۭ [morning] وَعَشِيًّۭا [and evening]
data.transliteration: La yasmaAAoona feeha laghwanilla salaman walahum rizquhum feeha bukratanwaAAashiyya

data.textUthmani: تِلْكَ ٱلْجَنَّةُ ٱلَّتِى نُورِثُ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا مَن كَانَ تَقِيًّا
data.wordByWord: تِلْكَ [This] ٱلْجَنَّةُ [(is) Paradise] ٱلَّتِى [which] نُورِثُ [We give (as) inheritance] مِنْ [[of] (to)] عِبَادِنَا [Our slaves] مَن [(the one) who] كَانَ [is] تَقِيًّۭا [righteous]
data.transliteration: Tilka aljannatu allatee noorithu min AAibadinaman kana taqiyya

data.textUthmani: وَمَا نَتَنَزَّلُ إِلَّا بِأَمْرِ رَبِّكَ ۖ لَهُۥ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِينَا وَمَا خَلْفَنَا وَمَا بَيْنَ ذَٰلِكَ ۚ وَمَا كَانَ رَبُّكَ نَسِيًّا
data.wordByWord: وَمَا [And not] نَتَنَزَّلُ [we descend] إِلَّا [except] بِأَمْرِ [by (the) Command] رَبِّكَ ۖ [(of) your Lord] لَهُۥ [To Him (belongs)] مَا [what] بَيْنَ [(is) before us] أَيْدِينَا [(is) before us] وَمَا [and what] خَلْفَنَا [(is) behind us] وَمَا [and what] بَيْنَ [(is) between] ذَٰلِكَ ۚ [that] وَمَا [And not] كَانَ [is] رَبُّكَ [your Lord] نَسِيًّۭا [forgetful]
data.transliteration: Wama natanazzalu illa bi-amrirabbika lahu ma bayna aydeena wama khalfanawama bayna thalika wama kana rabbukanasiyya
